title: Why do I always forget what I was trying to write as soon as I open my memo pad? - Quora

response.answer_text: It means you probably have short term memory loss or you are forgetful. Maybe you were going to write something that wasn’t that important. I’ve done this many times. Btw hope the memory loss thing didn’t offend you, that was just a thought. I always go to do something but end up walking somewhere random or doing something completely different. :)
